summary: THE VEHICLE WAS RECALLED FOR A FAULTY IGNITION SWITCH.  THE VEHICLES AFTER MARKET ALARM HAD TO BE DISCONNECTED IN ORDER FOR THE RECALL TO BE PERFORMED.  AFTER THE REPAIR, THE DEALER CHARGED THE CONSUMER TO HAVE THE ALARM RECONNECTED.  THE CONSUMER REQUESTED REIMBURSEMENT BUT WAS DENIED.  *TS   *NLM
